Dataset:Earnings and hours worked, region by occupation by four-digit SOC: ASHE Table 15

Notice

3 November 2020

The publication of this table has been delayedÂ as a result ofÂ the additional quality assurance challenges faced in collectingÂ Annual Survey for Hours and Earnings (ASHE)Â data this yearÂ because ofÂ the impact of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and will be made available byÂ 13Â NovemberÂ 2020. We apologise for any inconvenience.

Contact:
Roger Smith

Release date:
7 December 2020

Next release:
To be announced

Dataset ID: ASHE: Table 15 what is this?

About this dataset

Annual estimates of paid hours worked, weekly, hourly and annual earnings for UK employees by sex, and full-time and part-time, by region and four-digit Standard Occupational Classification 2010.
